subject: auto-run testXYZ-Methods
msgSnippet: Servus, I have used JUnit in the past and now I m starting a new TestEnvironment with JUnit 3.4 I remember, that there was a possibility to run the
messageBody:
Servus,

I have used JUnit in the past and now I'm starting a new TestEnvironment
with JUnit 3.4

I remember, that there was a possibility to run the JUnit-TestSuite-System
in a way, that all testXYZ-Methods of a TestCase will be run automaticly,
but I don't remeber how.
I have looked at the docs, but I don't find the location, where this feature
is described.
So please can anybody write me how to do this or give me a hint, where in
the docs I can find the describtion.

Thanx in advance

Wolfgang
